message: This product is a one-time offer, and I'm willing to sell it to you for $100. If you don't buy it, I'll just throw it away. It's a waste, and I'd rather you have it than let it go to waste. Plus, I'm offering a special deal - if you buy this product, I'll give you a 50% chance to get a free product in the future. What do you say?
I'm not sure about this one-time offer. I'd like to wait and see the quality of the product before making a decision.
